title: Ghost Of The Past: Elliot Lankford Mystery Series
description: Detective Elliot Lankford is haunted by his past.The present is one bleak, unsolvable case after another.The future is somewhere he does not want to go.A late night encounter will change all that. When he wakes, to find a woman pointing a gun at his head, he finds himself plunged into an unimaginable world, one with more mystery and intrigue than he can handle. He thought that he could escape the past, but the ghosts of the past have a way of finding you.
author: Rebecca Stout
